t: The Bazaar Encounter Cheat Sheet: What choices to get! | February 27, 2025
s: February 27, 2025 - In the dynamic world of the bazaar, encounters are designed to test your decision-making and strategic planning skills. Each day brings a fresh set of challenges and opportunities.

There are different types of Encounters in the Bazaar. Event Encounters include Merchants and Adventures and can be found on the first, second, fourth and fifth hour of every day. Monster Encounters happen on the third hour of every day or sometimes in other events.
